name: Band of Sizzling Thunder
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Lightning DMG by 10%.
4 Piece: When the wearer uses their Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by 20% for 1 turn(s).
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/b/b6/Item_Band%27s_Polarized_Sunglasses.png

name: Champion of Streetwise Boxing
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Physical DMG by 10%.
4 Piece: After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by 5% for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/e/ee/Item_Champion%27s_Headgear.png

name: Eagle of Twilight Line
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Wind DMG by 10%.
4 Piece: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/1/13/Item_Eagle%27s_Beaked_Helmet.png

name: Firesmith of Lava-Forging
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Fire DMG by 10%.
4 Piece: Increases the wearer's Skill DMG by 12%. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by 12% for the next attack.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/c/c3/Item_Firesmith%27s_Obsidian_Goggles.png

name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%.
4 Piece: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/e/ef/Item_Genius%27s_Ultraremote_Sensing_Visor.png

name: Guard of Wuthering Snow
bonuses:
2 Piece: Reduces DMG taken by 8%.
4 Piece: At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP is equal to or less than 50%, restores HP equal to 8% of their Max HP and regenerates 5 Energy.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/d/d6/Item_Guard%27s_Cast_Iron_Helmet.png

name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Ice DMG by 10%.
4 Piece: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/e/e2/Item_Hunter%27s_Artaius_Hood.png

name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Break Effect by 16%.
4 Piece: If the wearer's Break Effect is 150% or higher, the Break DMG dealt to the enemy target ignores 10% of their DEF. If the wearer's Break Effect is 250% or higher, the Super Break DMG dealt to the enemy target additionally ignores 15% of their DEF.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/0/0d/Item_Iron_Cavalry%27s_Homing_Helm.png

name: Knight of Purity Palace
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases DEF by 15%.
4 Piece: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield created by the wearer by 20%.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/7/7c/Item_Knight%27s_Forgiving_Casque.png

name: Longevous Disciple
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Max HP by 12%.
4 Piece: When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally or themselves, their CRIT Rate increases by 8% for 2 turn(s) and up to 2 stacks.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/4/4b/Item_Disciple%27s_Prosthetic_Eye.png

name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases SPD by 6%.
4 Piece: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/e/e4/Item_Messenger%27s_Holovisor.png

name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
bonuses:
2 Piece: ATK increases by 12%.
4 Piece: The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and Basic ATK DMG increases by 10%.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/7/7a/Item_Musketeer%27s_Wild_Wheat_Felt_Hat.png

name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Outgoing Healing by 10%.
4 Piece: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 1 Skill Point.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/0/00/Item_Passerby%27s_Rejuvenated_Wooden_Hairstick.png

name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuffs by 12%.
4 Piece: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/1/16/Item_Pioneer%27s_Heatproof_Shell.png

name: Prisoner in Deep Confinement
bonuses:
2 Piece: ATK increases by 12%.
4 Piece: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of its DEF when dealing DMG to it. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/5/54/Item_Prisoner%27s_Sealed_Muzzle.png

name: Sacerdos' Relived Ordeal
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases SPD by 6%.
4 Piece: When using Skill or Ultimate on one ally target, increases the ability target's CRIT DMG by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/8/82/Item_Sacerdos%27_Melodic_Earrings.png

name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%.
4 Piece: Increases DMG dealt by Skill and Ultimate by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/6/6d/Item_Scholar%27s_Silver-Rimmed_Monocle.png

name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases the DMG dealt by follow-up attacks by 20%.
4 Piece: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks, increases the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack up to 8 time(s) and lasts for 3 turn(s). This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/8/86/Item_Grand_Duke%27s_Crown_of_Netherflame.png

name: The Wind-Soaring Valorous
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases ATK by 12%.
4 Piece: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 6%. When the wearer uses a follow-up attack, increases the DMG dealt by Ultimate by 36%, lasting for 1 turn(s).
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/1/10/Item_Valorous_Mask_of_Northern_Skies.png

name: Thief of Shooting Meteor
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Break Effect by 16%.
4 Piece: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. After the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates 3 Energy.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/8/86/Item_Thief%27s_Myriad-Faced_Mask.png

name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Imaginary DMG by 10%.
4 Piece: When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and their CRIT DMG increases by 20% against Imprisoned enemies.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/d/d4/Item_Wastelander%27s_Breathing_Mask.png

name: Watchmaker, Master of Dream Machinations
bonuses:
2 Piece: Increases Break Effect by 16%.
4 Piece: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, all allies' Break Effect increases by 30% for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.
head: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/houkai-star-rail/images/3/30/Item_Watchmaker%27s_Telescoping_Lens.png
